item.title: System76 Starling Netbook v2
item.description: Linux system builder System76 created a successor to their 1st generation Starling netbook.

item.title: System76 Starling EduBook
item.description: A year after launching the 1st version of the Starling Netbook, Linux system builder System76 comes up with a new small laptop targeted at students.

item.title: Simmtronics Simmbook
item.description: The Simmbook by Indian manufacturer Simmtronics is a 10 inch screen netbook equipped with an 1.6 GHz Intel Atom N270 processor, 1GB RAM, 160GB HDD, a 1.3 megapixel camera.

item.title: ZaReason Teo
item.description: The ZaReason Teo, that I just discovered on Amazon.com, looks like the successor of the Terra A20, which was the first netbook by ZaReason.

item.title: Beginner Intro to Ubuntu Netbook Remix
item.description: If you are new to Ubuntu Netbook Remix this video will give you a basic overview and a few customization tips to get started with version 9.10 of this popular

item.title: Ubuntu Netbook Remix 9.10 on a Lenovo S10
item.description: In this video Marina from Marina's Bloggariffic reviews Ubuntu Netbook Remix Karmic Koala on her Lenovo Ideapad S10 netbook.
